text:
Fixed - thanks. Seems the author cut and paste a little too much.

I thought you didn't like EJBs :-)

releases. Just FYI ...

creator: poi-support@buni.org
text:
yup don't like EJBs one bit.  I'm not writing EJBs.  ;-) its for work, don't
have any say in it.  (Though every day it becomes more and more obvious on why
EJBs really suck)
